references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of using video generation models for complex tasks like object insertion.

references.paper_title: Pix2video: Video editing using image diffusion
references.reason: This paper introduces a technique for video editing using image diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the proposed VideoAnydoor framework.
This paper introduces a zero-shot object insertion method that is foundational to the methodology employed in the VideoAnydoor framework.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, making diffusion models a cornerstone of VideoAnydoor.

references.paper_title: 1st place solution for the uvo challenge on video-based open-world segmentation 2021
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the task of video object segmentation, a crucial component of the proposed method.
